name: Puzzle Crackin' Spirit
description:
PUZZLE CRACKIN' SPIRIT

READ COMIC VERSION HERE!

https://highblueyt.itch.io/puzzle-crackin-spirit-comic

GET THE BOARD GAME VERSION HERE!

https://highblueyt.itch.io/pcs-board-game

Welcome To Puzzle Crackin' Spirit!

Spark and Light get a note saying to help a man named 'Professor Redcle'. So they go off to help him. Things Get a little hard on the way.. So the only way you can complete this game is to have a PUZZLE CRACKIN' SPIRIT!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Jump

Up Arrow: Sprint

Hold Z While Touching A Wall: Climb

X: Combat

Keys 1-5: Element Attack

C: Change Character

Please Enjoy! Donate As well (on itch.io) If you can, Will help me out a lot as I'm going through some hard times right now.

-HighBlueYT
